interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Forfeels Long Straight Black Wig Synthetic Wigs for Women Natural Middle Part Lace Wig Heat Resistant Fiber Natural Looking Wig (30inch, Black Color)
Review Date: 2020/08/25
Store: forfeels
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'Forfeels', 'Package Dimensions': '9.33 x 6.34 x 2.36 inches; 10.58 Ounces', 'UPC': '791262892525'}
Review Text: Not a lace front wig. I wouldn’t even consider it a partial lace front. The only place it had lace was right at the part. It’s not a horrible or even bad wig. But it’s not a lace front. The fibers were soft but did shed. It’s comfortable enough to wear, but a little tight if you already have a lot of hair going under it. Can’t recommend it to any cosplayers out there looking at this for a costume, I think styling it may be hard with the way it’s wefted and fact it’s not actually a lace front if that’s what you’re looking for.
Review Title: Not actually a lace front wig
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
165G Jumbo Braiding Hair Blonde Synthetic Jumbo Braids 3 Packs
UHair
{'Package Dimensions': '13.94 x 6.69 x 3.74 inches; 1.19 Pounds'}
I wanted to make my own Rapunzel wig but cwas dissatisfied with the cost from Arda you only get 1 for $10 plus shipping and I needed 3 of them. I got these 3 for half the cost I originally bought from Arda. I kept the Arda ones until these came in just to check quality and they’re literally the exact same thing. So I sent the Arda ones back. I think the wig came out beautifully and you can’t even tell this was 3 separate braids at one point. Definitely would buy again! I followed a tutorial I found on google to make the wig, then added my own touches by including the lights!
Perfect base for Rapunzel Braids!
Cute Cartoon Makeup Brushes Set - 8pcs Fairy Makeup Brushes with Soft Pink Fiber and Metallic Handle for Eyebrow, Eyeshadow, Foundation, Blending and Lips, Great Gift for Sister Girlfriend (Style B)
rongji jewelry
{'Brand': 'rongji jewelry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Face Makeup', 'Color': 'Pink', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '8', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult,Teen', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '8.2 x 3.8 x 1.3 inches; 5.75 Ounces', 'UPC': '745695122377'}
VERY sturdy brushes. I was completely thrown at how sturdy/heavy these brushes are. I was totally expecting cheap light plastic handles that would break easily but that isn’t the case at all. The bristle portion of them is nice to because they’re not to thick or thin, easy to clean, and don’t shed off. Super cute Designs, I know who bts is but I’m not like a super fan or own any of their music to be honest but they definitely have quality merch as proven by these brushes. I don’t really care for the bag they came in, it’s nice enough but feels cheap in comparison to the brushes themselves. I just have them in my makeup bag instead.
Very good quality

profile:
The user continues to demonstrate a strong interest in crafting and custom hairstyling, focusing particularly on wig-making while exploring creativity in areas like makeup. They prioritize cost-effective solutions, opting for budget-friendly options without sacrificing quality. Their recent experience with a synthetic wig highlighted their desire for transparency in product labeling, especially regarding the features they value, such as lace fronts. Although the wig's quality was acceptable, the misrepresentation of its lace front characteristics impacted their overall satisfaction.

Their appreciation for high-quality makeup brushes reflects their dedication to functionality and aesthetic appeal in enhancing beauty applications. The user actively engages with product reviews, sharing thorough evaluations of quality and performance, illustrating their practical approach to purchasing. They value instructional content, frequently utilizing online tutorials for their crafting and beauty endeavors. Their willingness to return higher-priced items for more affordable alternatives showcases their discerning taste that aligns with quality and aesthetic value.

Overall, the user appreciates durable, visually appealing items that enable personalized expression in hair and beauty products. Their evolving interests suggest a broadening crafting repertoire while maintaining a consistent focus on affordability and quality.
